quoteText:
An individual who seeks access or would like to correct, amend, rectify or erase data, or should direct his/her query to the institution that is Turnitin’s customer (the ‘data controller’).
If the customer requests that Turnitin erases the data, we will respond within 30 calendar days.
title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data
